subject: Log Messages for Every method
msgSnippet: Hi, I have a BaseTest Class with the log4j logger as: protected void setUp() { sLog.info( Now Running the testcase :  + this.getClass().getSimpleName() + .
messageBody:
Hi,

protected void setUp() {

sLog.info("Now Running the testcase : " +
this.getClass().getSimpleName() + "." + this.getName());


Now, in the test class, i call :

public void setUp() {

Now, when i run the testMethod() i SHOULD get a Log4J Logging

Thanks,
